title: ‘A Higher Goal in Mind’: Wout van Aert Trims CX Program with Eye on Classics Boost
content:
Jumbo-Visma star tapping the 2023-24 cyclocross brakes: 'I don't want to leave anything to chance for the spring classics.'

Read the full article at ‘A Higher Goal in Mind’: Wout van Aert Trims CX Program with Eye on Classics Boost on Velo.
author: ahood
